message: Let's start fair and split the money evenly. What do you say?
My turn to propose. I think a 60/40 split is more reflective of the game's dynamics.  What do you say, Alice?
I think a 55/45 split is fair, considering the inflation that's starting to kick in. Let's make a deal.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this 55/45 split before inflation eats away at my share even more!
